Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
Enemy
public class Enemy extends Object
Class Enemy - an enemy (currently either a guard/warden) in an adventure game. This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application. "World of Zuul" is a very simple, text based adventure game. An "Enemy" is a hostile NPC whom can fight against the player whenever they are inside the same room
Version:
2016.02.29
Author:
Michael KÃ¶lling and David J. Barnes and Ahmer Alam
